mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history_events (team_id, event_month, event_day, event_year, title, description, image_url, type) VALUES (#{team.id}, #{eventMonth}, #{eventDay}, #{eventYear}, #{title}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT he.id, he.event_month, he.event_day, he.event_year, he.title, he.description, he.image_url, he.type, t.id as team_id, t.name as team_name, t.display_name as team_display_name, t.logo_url as team_logo_url FROM history_events he JOIN teams t ON he.team_id = t.id WHERE he.event_month = #{month} AND he.event_day = #{day}

SELECT he.id, he.event_month, he.event_day, he.event_year, he.title, he.description, he.image_url, he.type, t.id as team_id, t.name as team_name, t.display_name as team_display_name, t.logo_url as team_logo_url FROM history_events he JOIN teams t ON he.team_id = t.id WHERE he.event_month = #{month} AND he.event_day = #{day} AND he.team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM history_events WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND event_month = #{month} AND event_day = #{day}
